躈字的基本解释

躈
qiào
古同“噭”，牲畜的口；一说牲畜的后窍，即肛门。

躈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiào］
［《集韻》詰弔切，去嘯，溪。］
口。

躈字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　躈； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1235第03
【集韻】詰弔切，音竅。【史記·貨殖傳】馬蹄躈千。【註】躈，苦弔反。馬八髎也。索隱曰：尻骨爲八髎。一曰口也。蹄口共千，則爲二百。

躈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
躈字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Squat
qiào
In ancient times, "pu" means the mouth of livestock; when it comes to the posterior orifice of livestock, it is the anus.

["Ji Yun" cross-examination, go to Xiao, Xi. ]
mouth.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　躈; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1235 No. 03
[Ji Yun] Cross-examination and cut, sound orifice. [Historical Records · Commodity Transmission] Horseshoe Leap Thousands. [Note] 躈, stubbornly reluctantly. Ma Ba Liao also. Suo Yin said: The bones are eight liu. It's a mouthful. A total of thousands of hoof mouths is two hundred.
